text: The amount of the backward tilt and also the height is left to personal choice and the width is best taken directly from the work to ensure a good fit. Fix the piece A to B temporarily in place on the chair frame.
handwritten_text: The amount of the backward tilt and also the height is left to personal choice and the width is best taken directly from the work to ensure a good fit. Fix the piece A to B temporarily in place on the chair frame.
